EmailTemplate.name: Acknowledgement: Multiple Service Requests
EmailTemplate.subject: Philly 311 Reply to Your Multiple Service Requests Dated {!Contact.CreatedDate}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for contacting the City of Philadelphiaâ€™s 311 Contact Center. Your requests have been forwarded to the appropriate department(s) for investigation and appropriate action.
A separate case is created for each issue or location reported. You will receive a confirmation email for each case created. This will enable you to track or receive email updates related to the status of each issue or location reported. If you would like to receive status update emails please reply to each confirmation email for the cases you want to follow indicating you would like to receive automatic email updates.
You may track the status of each request using the reference number provided in the confirmation email via our website at http://www.phila.gov/311, replying to case confirmation email or dialing 3-1-1 (outside of Philadelphia dial 215-686-8686). Please note updates to the website may take up to 48 hours to appear.
Regards,
Philly311 Customer Support
